availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert B. White (Green County, Kentucky, farmhand.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmhand. Green County, Kentucky, native. Son of John G. White and Elizabeth W. White. Married to Victoria Smith White in Green County, Kentucky, on October 18, 1861. Resident of Green County in 1850. Household owned nine enslaved persons in Green County in 1850. Farmhand in Green County in 1860. Household owned eight enslaved persons in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 109A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 79B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Green County Marriages, Film 001877085.
